title: Haunted Zyra Missile Plant
body: Hey guys don't know if anyone else noticed but Haunted Zyra's missile plants have the animation fire from Basic Zyra's skin and not the plasma effect as her auto attack. Wonder if anyone can look into this? Plz :)

replies.body:
Hey Megashell,

Thanks for the report! We're looking into the issue now and will be working on a fix.
